type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">AutoRegenDialogues</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RitualsOfTheWildsConfig</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value type="text"><field name="TEXT">rituals_of_the_wilds_chernobog_26.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/Rituals_of_the_wilds/dialogues/eng</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First dialogue Based with reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Bad Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Neutral Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Normal Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Good Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">High Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">The tribute is received. Now choose. What truth do you seek, and what will it unmake in you?</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 Tell me about the world’s breaking — the old scars in the land.</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chernobog_color_dust_give</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Chernobog> The world was never whole. It was born torn — split by will and weight the moment we were shaped. Not created by love, no — forged by a thing greater than understanding. The Architect. The Nameless One. It made us to wrestle, not to rest. And so we did. Every god, every force, an echo of that first fracture.  The lands bleed because we breathe. The void seeps because I exist. The cracks you see are not wounds — they are veins, pulsing with purpose you were never meant to comprehend."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 Whisper to me of the forgotten gods — those who came before.</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chernobog_tied_dried_voidroot_give</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Chernobog> There were many. Some still slumber, others scream beneath mountains. They were not good. They were not bad. They were true. Leshy was among them — old as breath. Once a god of resistance, now just a whisper in leaves. He traded the shape of a god for bark and bone, to hide in the soil he loved.  Even now, forests feed him. Each uncut tree a prayer. Each burned grove a wound. He slows rot. I spread it. And still, we were both born from the same breath.  You name us gods. We were never that. We are... instruments. Instruments with teeth."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Second Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 I want power. Forbidden, if needed.</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chernobog_storm_ink_bottle_give</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">27</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Third Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 What do you want, Chernobog?</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">chernobog_moonlight_ink_bottle_give</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Chernobog> Ah... the question that dares. What does a storm want? What does rust seek? I was made to unravel. To peel back the lies of creation. I am entropy with a name.  And yet... I wonder. If Leshy can change — if roots can remember — can I?  What I want is to be seen. Not as evil. Not as feared. But as a truth that no longer has to scream through dying worlds to be heard."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Sound</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Fourth Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity Executed</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="write_json"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><field name="VAR">local:file</field></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
